bib_record.title: Fusion cross sections for 6,7Li + 24Mg reactions at energies below and above the barrier.

0.free_text: Cross sections for different exit channels of thereaction 6Li + 24Mg using the experimental gamma-raycross sections and the branching factor (the fractionof the residual nuclei emitting the characteristicgamma -ray when left in the bound states)The relevant "branching factors" were calculated withthe statistical model code CASCADE

free_txt: At IOP the gamma-rays produced during the
bombardment were detected by an HPGe detector of
~60 cm**3 volume, placed at 55. degr. with target to
detector distance ~6.5 cm. Both on-line and off-line
spectra were taken for each exposure. The off-line
spectra enabled us to identify the normal background
gamma-ray lines or the activity lines arising due to
At TIAR the characteristic gamma -rays emitted
by the  fusion evaporation residues were detected with
a Compton suppressed clover detector placed at 55.degr.
